page.title: 07Cheriton Fitzpaine Carnival
page.content: The carnival really begins when the flags are put up a week before the event.The{carnival}is held every two years in the middle of July the first one being in 1978.It starts early in the morning,two men dress up as fairies ringing bells and shouting about the carnival.At 2.00pm the {carnival queen}is crowned outside the Half Moon and later in the afternoon everyone goes to the field in fancy dress where they join the{floats} towed only by tractors.Each club chooses a theme and dresses up accordingly.At the field everyone is judged in 5 different classes,the overall winner receives a shield.Then they all parade through the village. Later on a{disco/dance}is held.A live band plays and goes on till past mid night.All money raised is divided between village organisations.
